name: CDiffInfectionTestsForCDiffToxinNucleicAcid
title: C. diff infection (Tests for C diff Toxin Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Clostridioides difficile nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Clostridioides difficile),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
